channel.title: bullsquid close atack bug
channel.description: When i use crowbar in close combat with bullsquid, monster doesnt responds. This works when i get close enough to bullsquid, almost in front of bullsquid' eyes.

item.title: bullsquid close atack bug
item.dc:creator: HEVcrab
item.description:
One more bullshitchicken AI bug.
It’s already been noticed that they only spit when at range and don’t try and charge you to whip or bite, and ignore you completely if they cannot see you. “They act like sentry guns” ©

Read full topic

item.title: bullsquid close atack bug

item.description:
When i use crowbar in close combat with bullsquid, monster doesnt responds. This works when i get close enough to bullsquid, almost in front of bullsquid’ eyes.
